definition: to take aim/(fig.) to aim one's looks at/to glance at
eye/item/section/list/catalogue/table of contents/order (taxonomy)/goal/name/title
Hmong or Miao ethnic group of southwest China/surname Miao
sprout
to take aim at/to target
telescopic sight/scope (on a rifle)
to shoot a glance at
sighting device/sight (for a firearm etc)
to aim in front of a moving target

sentences.english: I had stamped two seals and scanned them for you.
sentences.chinese: 我蓋了兩個印文併爲您們掃瞄之。

sentences.english: I stole one last glance out the window.
sentences.chinese: 我最後瞄了一眼窗外的夜空。

sentences.english: Ahsoka looked up shortly, her gaze bouncing back from the white armoured back like a thief.
sentences.chinese: 阿索卡將視線轉回白甲背影，小偷似的瞄了一下。

sentences.english: Another man, end up a camera position seems to be aiming to see a few.
sentences.chinese: 又一男的，端了個相機，看姿勢好像是瞄了幾下。

sentences.english: Steamed stuffed bun strabismus, he was aiming at the man.
sentences.chinese: 包子斜眼瞄瞄對方，他是個西裝筆挺的男士。

sentences.english: Steamed stuffed bun strabismus, he was aiming at the man.
sentences.chinese: 包子斜眼瞄瞄對方，他是個西裝筆挺的男士。

sentences.english: Now that God has unstrung my bow and afflicted me, they throw off restraint in my presence.
sentences.chinese: 鬆開他們的瞄疻待我，在我面前脫去轡頭。

sentences.english: Scan Collects all values from vehicles on-board computer.
sentences.chinese: 掃瞄收集所有的價值觀，從車輛的星載計算機。

sentences.english: Here you can configure the appearance of the thumbnail view of your scan picture gallery.
sentences.chinese: 在此您可以設定您的掃瞄圖像集的縮圖檢視。

sentences.english: And stop scanning the internet when you get a call from a client.
sentences.chinese: 並且在同客戶打電話時不要掃瞄因特網。

sentences.english: So I wrote it and attached the scanned file here;
sentences.chinese: 因此，我寫了此篇並附呈此掃瞄檔案。

sentences.english: A good beginning sight starts at $60.00.
The trick is to hold your breath while you aim.
sentences.chinese: 竅門就在於瞄準時須屏住呼吸。

sentences.english: He gave her a surreptitious look as he took four more of her cookies.
sentences.chinese: 他又把她的餅乾抓走四塊，還偷偷向她瞄了一眼。

sentences.english: He cast a disdainful glance at the prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 他輕蔑地瞄了一眼那個囚犯。

sentences.english: Now the seal is done, and one stamp is scanned for all to share.
sentences.chinese: 現在印已刻好，附上一掃瞄的印文供大家分享。
